metadata.title: CVE-2018-10100 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Before WordPress 4.9.5, the redirection URL for the login page was not validated or sanitized if forced to use HTTPS.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-10100` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.9.5+dfsg1-1').
